arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" B.\\"ODR_NO\\", " +" E.\\"CUST_NAME\\", " +" F.\\"DLV_LOC_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(B.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" B.\\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" C.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" G.\\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" (CASE WHEN B.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 AND C.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" IS NULL THEN 0 " +" WHEN B.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 AND C.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 " +" WHEN B.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 1 AND C.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" IS NOT NULL THEN 2 END) AS ODR_STATUS, " +" B.MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_ODR_CTL A, " +" T_ODR B, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC C, " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE D, " +" M_CUST E, " +" M_CUST_BASE F, " +" M_WH G " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"CUST_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND A.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND B.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND B.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND B.\\"ODR_NO\\" LIKE ? " +" AND B.\\"JOB_ODR_SET_FLG\\" = ? " +" AND B.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" = A.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" " +" AND B.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = '3' " +" AND B.\\"ODR_NO\\" = C.\\"ODR_NO\\"(+) " +" AND D.\\"ODR_NO\\"(+) = B.\\"ODR_NO\\" " +" AND NVL(D.\\"DEL_FLG\\", 0) = 0 " +" AND NVL(D.\\"SHIP_ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\", 0) = 0 " +" AND A.\\"CUST_CD\\" = E.\\"CUST_CD\\" " +" AND F.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" = B.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" " +" AND F.\\"CUST_CD\\" = A.\\"CUST_CD\\" " +" AND F.\\"SHIP_WH_CD\\" = G.\\"WH_CD\\" " +"ORDER BY " +" B.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" B.\\"ODR_NO\\""
"DELETE FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC A " +"WHERE " +" A.ODR_NO = ? " +" AND A.JOB_ODR_CD = ?"

"UPDATE " +" T_ODR " +"SET " +" T_ODR.JOB_ODR_SET_FLG = TO_NUMBER('0') " +"WHERE " +" T_ODR.ODR_NO IN ( " +" SELECT " +" A.ODR_NO " +" FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC A " +" WHERE " +" A.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" )"

"SELECT " +" A.JOB_ODR_CD " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC A, " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE B " +"WHERE " +" A.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND A.ODR_NO = B.ODR_NO " +" AND B.SHIP_ODR_CMPLT_FLG = '1' " +"GROUP BY " +" A.JOB_ODR_CD"

"SELECT " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" C.\\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(A.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" A.\\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\" - NVL(B.\\"SUM_ALCD_QTY\\", 0), " +" B.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR A, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" JOB_ODR_CD, " +" SUM(ALCD_QTY) AS SUM_ALCD_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +" GROUP BY " +" JOB_ODR_CD " +" ) B, " +" M_PLANT C " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = '0' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"PLAN_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" != TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = B.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND C.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\" - NVL(B.\\"SUM_ALCD_QTY\\", 0) > 0 " +"ORDER BY " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\""

"SELECT " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" C.\\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(A.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" A.\\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\" - NVL(B.\\"SUM_ALCD_QTY\\", 0), " +" B.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR A, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" JOB_ODR_CD, " +" SUM(ALCD_QTY) AS SUM_ALCD_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +" GROUP BY " +" JOB_ODR_CD " +" ) B, " +" M_PLANT C " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = '0' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"PLAN_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" != TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = B.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND C.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"ORDER BY " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\""

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" T_ODR_CTL A, " +" T_ODR B, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC C, " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE D, " +" M_CUST E, " +" M_CUST_BASE F, " +" M_WH G " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"CUST_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND A.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND B.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND B.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND B.\\"ODR_NO\\" LIKE ? " +" AND B.\\"JOB_ODR_SET_FLG\\" = ? " +" AND B.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" = A.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" " +" AND B.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = '3' " +" AND B.\\"ODR_NO\\" = C.\\"ODR_NO\\"(+) " +" AND D.\\"ODR_NO\\"(+) = B.\\"ODR_NO\\" " +" AND NVL(D.\\"DEL_FLG\\", 0) = 0 " +" AND NVL(D.\\"SHIP_ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\", 0) = 0 " +" AND A.\\"CUST_CD\\" = E.\\"CUST_CD\\" " +" AND F.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" = B.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" " +" AND F.\\"CUST_CD\\" = A.\\"CUST_CD\\" " +" AND F.\\"SHIP_WH_CD\\" = G.\\"WH_CD\\" " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR A, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" JOB_ODR_CD, " +" SUM(ALCD_QTY) AS SUM_ALCD_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +" GROUP BY " +" JOB_ODR_CD " +" ) B, " +" M_PLANT C " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = '0' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"PLAN_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" != TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = B.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND C.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\" - NVL(B.\\"SUM_ALCD_QTY\\", 0) > 0 " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR A, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" JOB_ODR_CD, " +" SUM(ALCD_QTY) AS SUM_ALCD_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +" GROUP BY " +" JOB_ODR_CD " +" ) B, " +" M_PLANT C " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = '0' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"PLAN_TYP\\" = '1' " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" != TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = B.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND C.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
"SELECT " +" B.ODR_NO " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC A, " +" T_ODR B " +"WHERE " +" A.ODR_NO = B.ODR_NO " +" AND A.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +"FOR UPDATE NOWAIT"
